Params: {3: 'Camu descends the narrow and inclined tunnel as if in free fall.'}
{3: "Soon, an enormous expanse unfolds before Camu's eyes—"}
{3: 'Who would have thought—that there could be such a massive area under a water park?'}
{3: 'Grabbing onto one of the pipes to decelerate, Camu lands with inhuman lightness.'}
{3: 'He raises his head. The place is in fact, even more expansive than he had imagined.'}
{3: 'There stands a colossus of a power supply module, encircled by an automated production line. Crimson electricity pulses like fire in the machines—indicative of the nature of their fuel.'}
{3: "Every breath, every strand of air here is virus, concentrated to the point where a single whiff can end any human's life."}
{3: 'And yet, even in such an environment, Camu does not feel the least bit of discomfort.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Camu', 3: "Tch, looks like that Roland guy wasn't talking out of his rear.", 4: '1'}
{3: "In the vast cavern, Camu's words are answered not even by echoes."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: "If you don't bring him back to Babylonia for emergency treatment, his frame won't just be useless, but the stability of his consciousness will also be jeopardized.", 4: '1'}
